name: HueHues - Demo
description:
Venture through the world of colors

HueHues is a puzzle game that put a spin on the concept of colors. In the world where everything has lost its vibrancy and colors, the lone slime "Mochi" possessed the power to see, absorb, and emit colors, allowing them to solve color puzzles and travel through painting to restore colors to the world.

This game is still in early development, feedbacks are very appreciated !

Features and puzzles (Concept ideas)

  • Solve color puzzle: use color theory and find clues in the map to solve puzzles by using colors (present in the demo)
  • Venture in painting: Jump into the paiting to learn more about the history of the world, solve puzzles, and see everything from a new perspective
  • See the world through colors: use your color power to change the reality, reveal the hidden colors in the black and white world (present in the demo)
